title: Praise God from Whom All Blessings Flow

verses.text:
Praise God, ye saints, in every place,
Praise him for his abounding grace;
Praise him who speaks, and it is done,
Praise Father, Spirit, and the Son.

Praise God, whose love has made us one,
Praise him through Christ, his blessed Son;
Praise him whose mercy never ends,
Praise him whose grace our souls defends.

Praise God, all nations of the earth,
Praise him who gave our souls new birth;
Praise him in death, and praise in life,
Praise him through joy and praise through strife.
